titleStmt.title: Mr. J. Briscoe, a director in the national land-bank, his defence of Dr. Hugh Chamberlen's bank or office of land credit. In a letter to the doctor
titleStmt.author: Briscoe, John, fl. 1695.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed and sold by T. Sowle in White-Hart Court in Grace-Church street,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Goldsmiths' Library, University of London.
